abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Euphorbia esula L." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Leiner-Herbar Konstanz 1 records from Korean Ethnobotany Database 1 records from Herbario EMMA. Herbario de la Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingenieros de Montes. UPM 1 records from Herbario de la Universidad de Sevilla, SEV-Historico 1 records from Herbario HSS Finca La Orden-Valdesequera (CICYTEX).
